name: One Map Game Challenge - The Calm before the Storm
name_original: One Map Game Challenge - The Calm before the Storm
description:
Hello, this is ScorchedGround.

This game was made for the One Map Game Challenge.

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/one-map-game-challenge.94392/

It is a Prequel to my other game, "The Partys Last Adventure", which was also made for a RPG Maker Challenge.

This game however is purely focused on story, characters and atmosphere.

So don't expect much in terms of gameplay or complex mechanics.

Nevertheless, please enjoy the game and feel free to give me feedback.
